thread.title: Pebble unveils round smartwatch to square off with Apple Watch
thread.title_full: Pebble unveils round smartwatch to square off with Apple Watch - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: Pebble unveils round smartwatch to square off with Apple Watch
text:
Palo Alto smartwatch maker Pebble on Wednesday introduced the $249 Time Round. Palo Alto smartwatch maker Pebble on Wednesday introduced the $249...
Smartwatch maker Pebble on Wednesday introduced a round-faced model, hoping to circle the long shadow of Apple’s square-shaped market leader. Palo Alto smartwatch maker Pebble on Wednesday introduced the $249 Time Round. Palo Alto smartwatch maker Pebble on Wednesday introduced the $249...
Smartwatch maker Pebble on Wednesday introduced a round-faced model, hoping to circle the long shadow of Apple’s square-shaped market leader.
